title: Himi 210
lyrics:
M.L.
1.
Pea ke folahi atu,
‘A ho kosipeli lelei
Ki he kakai kotoa pē,
Ke hā ki ai ho’o mo’oni.
2.
Pea ‘i he’emau hoko
Pea fo’ou ‘i he ‘ofa,
Te mau ‘ilo hono lahi,
‘Eiki, ‘a ho māfimafi.
3.
Te mau tu’uma’u ai pē, ‘i he
Fale, ‘o homau ‘Otua,
‘O hangē ko e ngaahi pou,
Tu’u pē, ‘o ‘ikai alu. *
